selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated angle to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated angle as the length input and the multiple-choice options to find the corresponding option label.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_D
new_skill_specs.purpose: Calculate the measure of angle D in a quadrilateral given specific conditions.
edge_cases: If the quadrilateral type is not specified, assume it is a cyclic quadrilateral if possible.
